params.validator: The address to add as a validator

params.covenantIds: Array of covenant IDs to mark as late

params.validator: The address to remove as a validator

params._kudo: The address of the Kudo contract

params.newOwner: The address of the new owner

params.agent: The address of the agent making the payment
params.covenantId: The ID of the covenant/NFT (bytes32 for legacy systems)
params.nftId: The NFT ID in Kudo contract (optional, set to 0 to skip Kudo update)
params.requestHash: The hash of the validation request
params.responseUri: Optional URI pointing to proof of payment

getVerifiedPayments(address).notice: Get all verified payments for an agent

transferOwnership(address).notice: Transfer ownership to a new owner

validatePayment(address,bytes32,uint8,by.notice: Validate a payment for a specific agent/covenant with NFT ID
